text: The men's lightweight single sculls competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 25 August 2019 || 12:51 || Heats |- | Monday 26 August 2019 || 14:30 || Repechages |- | rowspan=2|Wednesday 28 August 2019 || 13:43 || Quarterfinals |- | 16:46 || Semifinals E/F |- | rowspan=4|Thursday 29 August 2019 || 13:00 || Semifinals A/B |- | 16:50 || Semifinals C/D |- | 17:05 || Final F |- | 17:20 || Final E |- | rowspan=4|Friday 30 August 2019 || 09:55 || Final D |- | 10:05 || Final C |- | 10:22 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 13:55 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The three fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the quarterfinals.
